700746f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Schofield Street
700746f-a.text:
232 City Island Ave. (City Island), at the S.E, corner of Schofield
Street (left, running towards background).
July 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700746f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Schofield Street, Bronx, NY

700735f-a.title: Bronx: Schofield Street - City Island Avenue
700735f-a.text:
Schofield Street (City Island), north side, between City IIsland Ave.
and the east shore, showing Engine 70 of the New York Fire Department.
July 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
